attributes.action: Allow 16 year olds to vote in the EU membership referendum in 2017
attributes.additional_details: 16 year olds should be allowed to vote in the upcoming referendum as the result will have a long lasting affect on their future as a citizen of the UK.

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition title: Lower the UK franchise to 16 year's of age.

Created by: Rudi Affolter

Closing: 30/03/2015
